query: SELECT l.id, l.title, COUNT(q.id) as question_count FROM lessons l LEFT JOIN quiz_questions q ON l.id = q.lessonId WHERE l.title LIKE '%Comprehensive%' GROUP BY l.id, l.title;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SELECT l.id, l.title, COUNT(q.id) as question_count FROM lessons l LEFT JOIN quiz_questions q ON l.id = q.lessonId WHERE l.title LIKE '%Comprehensive%' GROUP BY l.id, l.title;
